issue.title: Coulomb friction parameters not handled properly in dart

content.raw:
Yes, it's using a friction pyramid internally but uses single friction coefficient for the two friction directions by [taking the lower single friction coefficient of the colliding bodies](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/blob/master/dart/constraint/ContactConstraint.cpp#L114-115).

Supporting two friction coefficient with custom friction direction will be implemented in the future.
content.html:
Yes, it's using a friction pyramid internally but uses single friction coefficient for the two friction directions by taking the lower single friction coefficient of the colliding bodies.

Supporting two friction coefficient with custom friction direction will be implemented in the future.
